11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Imran bin Hussain said:"The Prophet (ﷺ) prayed Zuhr and a man behind him recited: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High. When he had finished praying, he said: 'Who recited: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High?" A man said: 'I did.' He said: 'I realized that some of you were disputing with me over it

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الْقِرَاءَةِ خَلْفَ الإِمَامِ فِيمَا لَمْ يَجْهَرْ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Not reciting behind the imam in prayers where he does not recite loudly
